channel.title: 317 help!
channel.description: How do I add dragon arrows on a 317 server? Also, how do I set the req. lvl for weapons and armour? Thanks :D

item.title: 317 help!
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“Darthax, post:2, topic:326534”]ok (1) no one in a 317 server uses dragon arrows they make ice arrows dragon arrows

And sorry can not help with that second one still learning the hole codeing thing myself[/quote]
Not true from rs u can download the models gfx’s so it’s possible for sure in 317 alot of servers have it!

i have d-arrows but wrong emote;) need the gfx’s
